title: Heat Wave: Aloha Escapade (Pippa Romance) Novelette Boxed Set 1, 2 and 3
description: Heat Wave: Aloha Escapade (Pippa Romance) Novelette Boxed Set 1, 2 and 3She was engaged to be married and thought she had the man of her dreams. When her friends offered to take her on a trip to Hawaii in lieu of her bachelorette party, Mara gladly accepted. The trip was supposed to be a girls' time away, but turned out to be a "girls' time to play" in paradise - the land of Aloha.At the encouragement of her best friends, Mara was only too happy to have her last freedom fling before her wedding. What she didn't expect was that things would soon become messy. Andrew showing up as a surprise only served to complicate matters more. A one week trip suddenly turned into a two day nightmare and what happened next......was left totally up to fate...Spice Level: Erotic and romantic. Adult content warning: explicit love scenes. Some scenes include graphic language and highly erotic subject matter. For adults, 18+ only.
author: Pippa McLaren
